00049 typedef boost::shared_ptr<Animation> pAnimation;
00050 
00051 /*
00052     Bounding volumes are never stored complete in this rendering engine. They are always stored partially by the
00053     Animation class and then completed by the calling node, and then returned in their completed form. The idea
00054     is not to explicitly provide bounding volumes, but to provide data for the derived applications to impliment
00055     their own.
00056     As an example, the bounding volume data is used by Mob2DRenderer to impliment automatic culling.
00057 */
00058 
00059 #endif // ANIMATION_H
